flex2.compiler.common

Class FontsConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • flex2.compiler.common.FontsConfiguration

  • public class FontsConfiguration
extends Object
    This class defines the fonts related configuration options. These options are typically set via flex-config.xml.
    Author:
    Kyle Quevillon, Peter Farland

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FontsConfiguration.Languages
      Defines a subconfiguration for font languages.
